text: If you have Litmus, there's Litmus Personalize with an Instagram Feed option, but otherwise there's not another way that's going to be supported in email clients.
You'd have to use Amp4Email, but HubSpot doesn't support it. See: <https://amp.dev/support/faq/email-support>
It's also not supported across email clients, very few. When it comes to forms, you're better off linking to a landing page with the form.
